name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight Broken Links, Alts, and UX Changes for SEO | Webloom

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your website's SEO with Webloom SEO Toolkit, the all-in-one tool for site audits, UX comparison.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Webloom SEO Toolkit: Analyze, Audit & Improve Your Website’s SEO in One Click

Take control of your website's SEO with Webloom SEO Toolkit, the all-in-one tool for site audits, UX comparison, and performance checks. Whether you're a digital marketer, SEO specialist, or website owner, this extension provides you with the essential tools to enhance your site’s user experience and search engine ranking.

 Key Features

- Highlight Broken Links: Instantly detect and highlight all broken links on any webpage. No more lost traffic due to non-functional URLs!
- Highlight New Links and Buttons: Easily spot newly added elements like links and buttons that might affect your website’s UX or conversion rates.
- Highlight Images Without Alt Text: Ensure your website is accessible and SEO-friendly by identifying images missing the important `alt` attribute.
- Open Cached Version of a Page: Quickly access the cached version of any webpage via the Wayback Machine to review past content or check how search engines view your page.
- Check if a Page is Indexed on Google: Easily open a Google search to verify if the current page is indexed, a key aspect of SEO visibility.
- Compare the UX Between Two Dates Using Wayback Machine: Compare changes in your site’s user experience (UX) over time with just one click by accessing archived versions of your site through the Wayback Machine.

 Who is it for ?

This extension is perfect for:
- SEO Specialists looking to improve site performance and fix critical SEO issues.
- Web Developers who want to monitor UX changes and troubleshoot SEO-related errors.
- Digital Marketers aiming to ensure optimal website performance and user experience for their campaigns.
- Website Owners seeking an easy-to-use solution for site audits and performance monitoring.

 Why Webloom SEO Toolkit ?

With Webloom SEO Toolkit, you can perform comprehensive checks on any website within seconds. From identifying broken links to checking cached pages, this tool helps you optimize your website’s technical and on-page SEO. The added UX comparison feature through the Wayback Machine allows you to track site changes and make data-driven improvements.
